0.text: Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, which lasts 6 seconds, refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
0.html:
Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, which lasts 6 seconds, refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times.

Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
markedPassages: 10% bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, Ezreal's abilities' cooldowns are  reduced by 1.5 seconds (including Mystic Shot's).
1.html: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, Ezreal's abilities' cooldowns are  reduced by 1.5 seconds (including Mystic Shot's).
markedPassages: reduced

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy  champion, epic  monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy champion, epic monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
monster

1.text: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark, dealing them magic damage.
1.html: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark, dealing them magic damage.

2.text: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores the  mana cost of that ability plus  60 mana.
2.html: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores the  mana cost of that ability plus  60 mana.
markedPassages: mana cost
mana cost
60 mana

0.text: Active: After the cast time, Ezreal  blinks from his current location up-to 475 units towards the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals magic damage to the nearest enemy and briefly  reveals them.
0.html: Active: After the cast time, Ezreal blinks from his current location up-to 475 units towards the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals magic damage to the nearest enemy and briefly reveals them.
markedPassages: blinks
reveals

1.text: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by  Essence Flux.
1.html: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by Essence Flux.
markedPassages: Essence Flux

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: visible

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an energy projectile in the target direction, which briefly grants  sight of the area it flies through and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires an energy projectile in the target direction, which briefly grants sight of the area it flies through and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Minions and non-epic  monsters take 50% reduced damage.
1.html: Minions and non-epic monsters take 50% reduced damage.
markedPassages: Minions
monsters

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+30% attack speed
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Threefold Strike: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks decay once every 0.5 seconds after the duration ends.
Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3 bonus attack damage, 3 ability haste, and 3 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THREEFOLD STRIKE: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks decay once every 0.5 seconds after the duration ends.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  833

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.

Stats

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal 60% − 12% (based on distance) AD physical damage to other enemies near the target. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal 60% − 12% (based on distance) AD physical damage to other enemies near the target. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+50 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  500
